> "I'm headindg to the ark"said Kup.
>
> Elita sit down and waited news about her uncle

Lord Elder nodded as he turned to Elita again, "See, I told you he
wouold be alright." he smiled, greatful that little Elita hadn't cried
again during the crisis.

With a deft touch Elder opened a portion of the shielding whenever Kup
made his way toward it, while still keeping an optic out for that
elusive sensor ghost that kep appearing and disappearing. He hadn't
seen it in a while, and that in itself made him more worried than
anything. The enemy you can see is easier to deal with than the one
you can't.

He frowned as he realized something. It was really small, and he was
not sure why it caught his atention at all, but it did. During the
time that the dot appeared there was a slight increase in
electromagnetic energy. Not much, and certainly it would not have
caught the attention of most. However checking the sensor logs
confirmed it.

With a click he opened the Maximal channel, heaviest level of
encryption, "I believe I understand why the sensors were able to
detect the sensor ghost. It is because it was transmitting something."
Elder scanned the logs, "I'm not exactly sure how long it's been
there, but it's been a while."

(TAG)

Preston
